knimeNode.name: Workflow Summary Extractor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Extracts a workflow summary from a workflow port object as a XML or JSON document.

fullDescription.intro: This node generates a workflow summary document in either XML or JSON format and stores it in the output table. The workflow summary document serves as a detailed structured description of a workflow including it's structure, configuration, port specifications, node & workflow annotations, and more.
fullDescription.option: The output format in which to generate the summary. Valid values are either JSON or XML.
The name of the column the summary is saved in. (The name of the row is always “summary”.)

ports.inPort: The workflow to create the summary for
ports.outPort: The table with a single cell containing the workflow summary
